articles.title: Ford Mustang Mach 1 to return to streets after 17-year absence. Here's what it looks like - USA TODAY
articles.description: Since its first-generation model in 1969, Ford has built just two Mach 1s. This one goes on sale next spring and takes features from popular Shelby GTs.
articles.content:
Mustang Serial Number 1 accidentally sold in 1964, but was possibly saved because of that.
USA TODAY
